summary: CONTINUED PROBLEMS WITH TRANSMISSION SHAKE AND SHUDDER DURING ACCELERATION FOR A STOPPED POSITIONS , SUCH AS RED LIGHTS, STOP SIGNS ETC. ALSO SHAKE AND SHUDDER WHEN ACCELERATING COMING OUT OF A LEFT OR RIGHT TURN.  SHAKE OR SHUDDER MOST TROUBLESOME WHEN TRYING TO ACCELERATE QUICKLY TO MERGE ON A BUSY ROAD WITH A SHORT ACCESS/RAMP. IT HAS BEEN OCCURRING SINCE I PURCHASED THE CAR IN 2013. DEALER SAYS THEY HAVE "TRIED " "SOFTWARE UPDATES" BUT NO IMPROVEMENT OR CHANGES, NOTICED.
